title: Client restart loop
body:
The second my most recent game ended, it told me there was a problem patching league so I needed to restart it. I did, then it said "we restored to a  backup version" and now it's just looping.
Help?

replies.body: Let us know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still having this restart loop problem. Most of these issues have been cleared up at this point, but I'd still like to help if not!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5ZIsZRBE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-12T21:18:23.019+0000)
>
> Let us know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still having this restart loop problem. Most of these issues have been cleared up at this point, but I'd still like to help if not!

Tried to log back in the next day and it worked, everything's back to normal!
